item.description:
Maribeth said that she will be there from noon to 2 or 2:30.
If you would like her to be there later, then please e-mail her.
You can still go there from 2:30 to 5, but our POC Maribeth will not be there.
Enjoy.
Look to our calendar for more Psychic fairs throughout the state.

When we were at Carousel Gardens last week, our waitress was telling us about
The different Psychic Fairs that are held there.

Maribeth and UZ's Liz D were interested in attending this event.

Members of Coffee Talk enjoyed Carousel Gardens the last time,
So we will invite Coffee Talk to go back.

Psychic Fair
Sat. March 29, 2008
12:00-5:00

http://www.carouselga...

www.carouselgardens.com/entertainment.html

Readings by

Gary - Intuitive Readings & Channels

John - Tarot, Zen Tarot & Celtic Runes

Rachael - Angel Readings & Pet Channeling

Debbie - Reads Playing Cards

Mary -

$20.00 per 15 minutes per reading


Luncheon Menu Available

Please take lots of photos and let me know if you get orbs or anything else.

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: Maribeth is the Point of Contact for this event. She will be there from 12 to 2:30. Look at her photo in the member's list. She will probably be in the room with the Psychics.
item.why: Carousel Gardens is a beautiful mansion with a haunted history. They have fantastic food. Our group went here before and had a great time.
item.name: Have a Cup Of Coffee with Pyschics in Seymour
